attributes.action: enforce better maternity care in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We've all heard about the appaling maternity care in Britain. We need this to stop, peoples life and children could be at risk of having the family they want! Sign the patition now, think of your mothers, daughters, sisters and female freinds! and act today!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
